To make future predictions, environmental variables (see above) were considered under Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)â€™s RCP8.5 scenario using four climatic models (HadGEM2-CC, HadGEM2-ES, ACCESS1.0 and ACCESS1.3) considered as performant (reasonably simulating recent past climate) when predicting future Arctic climates, in particular the cryosphere
